alert.note: Alert for Buffalo (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Buffalo County through 745 PM CDT... At 714 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Modena, or 8 miles northeast of Alma, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Modena, Waumandee, Gilmanton, Montana, Highway 95 And County G, Tell, Cream, Praag and Highway 95 And County C. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
